original_text: Then you will use the wool from your sheep to make clothes. You make clothes from your sheep's wool. You will sell your goats, and you will buy a field. Then you will use the wool from your sheep to make clothes. You make clothes from your sheep's wool. You will sell your goats, and you will buy a field.
korean_text: 어린 양의 털은 네 옷이 되며 염소는 밭을 사는 값이 되며

sentences.original_text: Then you will use the wool from your sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 네 양들의 양털을 사용할 것이다

sentences.original_text: You make clothes from your sheep's wool
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 양들의 양털로 옷을 만든다

sentences.original_text: and you will buy a field
